originalText.text: They refused to slather my food with thier nut grease but that's ok

text.text: They refused to slather my food with thier nut grease but that's ok

originalText.text: This was such a great experience for me and my friends. I’d definitely plan another bachelorette party here! We got the VIP, and the pricing was pretty decent, especially since it came with quite some perks (a bottle, seating closer to the action lol, etc). Our to-be-bride even got to go on stage, which you should brace yourself for, by the way. Because That’s when the party really starts, lol. And the guys were really fun! Only downside is that we ended up having to buy more drinks because we finished our bottle quick, but the drinks were pretty cheap ($22 for 2) since most clubs in the city charge 20 per drink anyway. Overall, I’d Definitely come back!

originalText.text: When booking anything online I'm always skeptical if someone didnt recommend a place to me. So saying that i contacted the owner of the show a few times with questions regarding the performance and what i was looking for to celebrate my best friends bachelorette party.  Ray was awesome he was patient accomodating and through. The venue was switched at the last minute but the alternate venue was very nice. The show itself was amazing my best friend had an awesome time. Thank you to Ray and his team.

originalText.text: Attended the show tonight for a friends bday and we had a ball. The guys are not just good looking... they have great personalities and definitely make an effort for you to have a great time. Coming back for my sis bday next!

originalText.text:
Very disappointed in this production. Must say I had much much higher expectations. On top of paying over $500 for "VIP Access" (which consisted of "VIP" access fot 8 guests, a hot seat for the bride and bottle of champagne...) there was a mandatory  $22 two drink minimum at the door for our ENTIRE party including the bride. "VIP" consisted of a few chairs placed around 2 Ikea quality end tables and a closer view of the stage. The men were very attractive, however for such a big production, would have been nice to see them put together A LOT BETTER. Attire to go along with theme Male Review. Men were dressed in regular jeans and sneakers, wearing your their everyday Hanes, JOE Boxer and Calvin Klein indees. Would have been nice for them to be unifotm shirtless with a bow tie, nice boxers, slacks and maybe a pair of shoes.

I personally would not recommend this place. Reminded me of a hot sweaty Greek college party. If you do decide to go do yourself and your friends a favor and do not pay for VIP.

To top it off show ended 30 minutes early.
